short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you open a 'New Tab' it's blank and set to the background color of your desire.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you open a 'New Tab' it's blank and set to the background color of your desire.

Changelog:
* Version 1.5.3
- Removed unneeded permission

* Version 1.5.2
- First run default value set to #4c4a48
